mapper.select:
select count(1) from
zlzt_datainfo t
${params.fromTable} t

select.if:
select t.*,a.name as fIdName,b.name as sIdName,c.name as tIdName,d.name as cIdName from ${params.fromTable} t
inner join gf_classifyinfo a on t.fId = a.id inner join gf_classifyinfo b on t.sId = b.id inner join gf_classifyinfo c on t.tId = c.id inner join gf_classifyinfo d on t.cId = d.id
inner join yf_classifyinfo a on t.fId = a.id inner join yf_classifyinfo b on t.sId = b.id inner join yf_classifyinfo c on t.tId = c.id inner join yf_classifyinfo d on t.cId = d.id
inner join zlzt_classifyinfo a on t.fId = a.id inner join zlzt_classifyinfo b on t.sId = b.id inner join zlzt_classifyinfo c on t.tId = c.id inner join zlzt_classifyinfo d on t.cId = d.id

mapper.update:
update zlzt_datainfo t
cId = #{cId},
country = #{country},
openId = #{openId},
openDay = #{openDay},
applyId = #{applyId},
applyDay = #{applyDay},
title = #{title},
titleFy = #{titleFy},
zy = #{zy},
zyFy = #{zyFy},
powerAsk = #{powerAsk},
powerAFy = #{powerAFy},
powerAN = #{powerAN},
applyMan = #{applyMan},
applyPlace = #{applyPlace},
createMan = #{createMan},
lawS = #{lawS},
nowLawS = #{nowLawS},
zlType = #{zlType},
ipcMC = #{ipcMC},
ipcMCFy = #{ipcMCFy},
ipc = #{ipc},
ipcFy = #{ipcFy},
cpec = #{cpec},
cpecFy = #{cpecFy},
beUsedNum = #{beUsedNum},
value = #{value},
zlImage = #{zlImage},
zlText = #{zlText},
createTime = #{createTime},
updateTime = #{updateTime},
where t.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
substring(${keyname},1,4) keyname,
substring(${keyname},1,4) keyname,
${keyname} keyname ,
count(*) count from ${fromTable}
and fId = #{fId}
and sId = #{sId}
and tId = #{tId}
and cId = #{cId}
and secret = #{secret}
and ( secret is null or secret != 'secret' )
and country in
'${item}'
and SUBSTRING(applyDay,1,4) in (${applyDayStr})
and SUBSTRING(openDay,1,4) in (${openDayStr})
and applyMan in
'${item}'
and
createMan like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
and nowLawS in
'${item}'
and zlType in
'${item}'
and
ipc like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
and cpec in
'${item}'
group by keyname ORDER BY keyname desc ,count asc
